s.text: "A trumpet will sound and John Fitzgerald Kennedy Jr. will rise out of the Sound, clothed in pure white, shining like the sun, surrounded by the hosts of heaven."
One reason Long Island epitomizes boredom is because of its ur-suburb, Levittown, tedium expressed as architecture.
